meanings.definition: Showing or characterized by cheerfulness or lighthearted excitement.
meanings.sent1: The children's laughter made the playground even gayer.
meanings.sent2: Her smile made the room feel gayer.
meanings.sent3: The clown's antics made the party even gayer.
meanings.sent4: The colorful balloons made the fair gayer than ever.
meanings.sent5: The cheerful music made the atmosphere gayer and more vibrant.

meanings.sent1: The flowers in the garden looked even gayer under the sun.
meanings.sent2: The painting was full of gayer hues that brightened the room.
meanings.sent3: The rainbow looked even gayer after the rainstorm.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in gayer shades of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The festive decorations made the room gayer with their bright colors.

meanings.definition: To make or become more cheerful or lively.
meanings.sent1: The jokes he told gayered up the atmosphere at the party.
meanings.sent2: She gayered the mood by playing upbeat music.
meanings.sent3: The surprise dance performance really gayered the event.
meanings.sent4: The lively conversation gayered the dull evening.
meanings.sent5: The energetic dance moves gayered up the room with excitement.
